links.title: Jim Cramer:
links.description: You'd have to look long and hard to find someone who has been as bullish as I have been for the last couple of years. But there have been moments where I have cautioned that things aren't as good as they were and I suggest that you could get lower prices for some stocks even as others could surge.

links.title: 10 S&P 500 Stocks to Buy for the Long-Term
links.description: The last few days have been tough ones for too many investors in S&P 500 stocks. Though far from devastating, the existing backdrop of anxiety exacerbated the fear incited by the modest selloff. And traders still aren't sure what the foreseeable future holds. In simplest terms, it's just plain stressful.
